mapper.insert: insert into orders (number, status, order_time, checkout_time, remark, pay_method, amount, phone, address, user_id, address_book_id, pay_status, consignee) values (#{number}, #{status}, #{orderTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{remark}, #{payMethod}, #{amount}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{payStatus}, #{consignee})
